description: 32bit unsigned integer. Admitted range values between 0 and 2147 millions (2.147.483.647 i.e 2^31-1)
Integer value. When casted and ordered as string it shows a list in a hierarchical order
Integer value. When casted as string it represents a 'yyyymmdd' date formatted value
UTF-8 char array. Not admitted chars outside of this reg-ex rule: [a-z_]
